title: Last Hextech Chest in 5 Hextech Chest Bundle used, but no loot
body:
So I recently purchased a 5 Hextech Chest Bundle for 975rp and opened all chests immediately. I was able to open four (in quick succession) and obtain their respective loot. 

However, the client was taking a while to open the last chest, so I decided to click elsewhere (the store) in an attempt to refresh it; only to return to the loot page and discover that I had no fifth loot item and both chest and key had been used. 

Has anyone else had this problem?

TLDR: Purchased a 5 Hextech Chest Bundle for 975rp, successfully opened four Chests but lost the fifth.

replies.body:
Hey there,

If you're still having trouble with your hextech loot you're going to have to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Player Support, we here on the boards are unable to assist with account specific inquiries.
Alright will do, thank you very much
